directions:
Sprinkle about 3/4-1 tsp salt on each salmon fillet. Wrap them with paper towels and plastic. Let them sit in the refrigerator over night.

Optionally coat with oil.

Grill salmon on a fish grill, 3-4 minutes each side.

Serve with white rice and soy sauce.

Sprinkle about 3/4-1 tsp salt on each salmon fillet. Wrap them with paper towels and plastic. Let them sit in the refrigerator over night.

Optionally coat with oil.

Grill salmon on a fish grill, 3-4 minutes each side.

Serve with white rice and soy sauce.
html.ingredients:
salmon, cut into 1" thick fillets

salt

oil

name: Shiozake (Grilled Salted Salmon)
